reviews.review_msg: Zamir is a fun and passionate prof who makes biology engaging with his raps and jokes. While the exams focus on memorization, using resources like Unstuckstudy alongside the textbook can help you ace this class.
Awesome teacher who is clearly passionate. Really funny and generous, overall my favourite teacher I've had here. Definitely memorization heavy for tests but they're still fair.
was really nice

He is a great prof! He explains the material in a clear and concise manner, and never fails to make and us laugh with his poems and rap. He tests fair, but memorize all the content that is in his slides as his exams are more memorization than applications of specific processes. Overall if you have to take any biology class, take one with him!

A really passionate professor who seems to really care about his students. The lecture are entertaining and you get useful practice questions every week. His exams though aren't great. They contain questions that are unrelated to the field of bio and are rather for example what he said is a good study tip. He looks for very specific keywords to.
Very good prof. Attend lectures do his practice and you will be fine. Great lectures and prioritizes understanding
Super fun and passionate professor. He makes an obvious effort to engage students and has colourful engaging lecture slides. Definitely get ready to memorize for the tests!
Great rapper!
funny guy, boring lectures but he did a rap for us at the end of the sem

His slides are full of pictures and very colourful. They are some of the best slides to look at. He also had some entertainment going on at the end of the semester to wish me good luck on my exam. Arf-arf.
He clearly knows his stuff, he cares a lot about his students, and his lectures are really engaging. THE END OF SEMESTER RAP WAS AMAZING!!! He is an awesome teacher!
The GOAT
Absolute beauty. One of the few profs actually good at his job. 11/10 recommend.
best prof, every on exam is in lecture, explains concepts very well and also very entertaining

Amazing prof and person, very funny and keeps lectures very engaging. Best biology prof I've ever had, made me more interested in biology, especially plants. Only thing is his first midterm was wayyyy too long, couldn't finish it. However, the material on the midterms are exactly like his lecture slides and instructor questions. Love him

Dr. Punja is a great prof. The notes are easy to understand along with his explanations and he makes the lecture videos very enjoyable as he cracks some jokes here and there. If you ever have the chance, take bisc 101 with him!

Zamir was a good prof. He writes notes on two ancient overhead projectors, and then the tests are based exactly off of those notes. Just memorize the notes and you will do well. He's a pretty funny guy, and tries hard to keep lectures engaging.

You probably have to go to classes since he writes his notes and doesn't post them online. He is really funny and his tests are fair. He lets you know what to expect on them and writes figures from the text for you to look at. The notes are brief sometimes, so you should get info from online or the textbook to complete the notes & to do better!

You can't miss Dr. Punja's class because it is too much fun! He is a really funny prof and exams are fair as long as you memorize the notes! He writes his notes so you can't miss lecture either since he doesn't post them. That however makes you catch up more easily because he writes as he talks. He even did a rap for us on the last day! Love him!!

Excellent prof that knows how to maintain lecture interest. You must attend lectures to get the notes you need to study for exams. I did not like how this class had three separate instructors though. It's a terrible approach and completely threw me off. Labs had zero guidance/instruction, although that has very little to do with Dr. Punja.

Punja is a likeable, funny guy. However, he seems to have a very narrow understanding of the material. I felt like he had just read the relevant chapters of the textbook and summarized the material instead of actually drawing on his own knowledge. He also makes a lot of errors in lecture. His exams are fairly easy and the questions predictable.

He's enthusiastic and friendly but he gets kind of lost when I ask him specific questions beyond the lecture. His notes are ALMOST all you need to study. I found them to be too brief at times but his notes alone should get you at least a B+. Test is just pure memory work . Textbook is only used for lab worksheet or as reference pictures. no scaling

He was my prof when I was a first year student at SFU and he's one of those profs that you tend to remember long after you've finished the course! Totally knew how to handle 1st years, made the concepts interesting, and always went above and beyond to give the class a fun time! Exams are SO FAIR!! As long as you read the textbook you're good to go!

By far the best prof I've ever had! The course isn't particularly easy, but Punja definitely makes lectures fun! He writes all his notes down, so make sure you attend all the lectures! The text book is helpful to have!

Zamir is a good pro. He makes lectures interesting, also he is a good poet since I can never write a poem about exams...  However his handwriting is unclear. He doesn't use ppt or give out slides so if you miss a lecture you are screwed. Exams are difficult... you did the review and you came to the gym to take the test, then you found omg wth
Hated his picky exams. He could make plants more interesting. I'd never take a plant course after this set of lectures.
Punja was ok with a few jokes and likeable but way too easy.

My favourite prof at SFU so far. Sure he makes you memorize his lecture notes completely and is very picky as to what he will give you marks for on the exam, but his lecture notes are all you need and he is a very good lecturer. He makes the content interesting and adds in some fun stuff here and there. Be prepared to memorize though.

So I had a midterm and he said if you study the notes you'll be fine. Guess what? I wasn't fine. Memorized all the notes word by word and still did not get anything as close as I had expected. Otherwise nice. funny guy. Really engaging lectures and worth coming too. Knows how to deal with first-years.
Dr. Punja is awesome! Super funny and entertaining. 1010 WOULD RECOMMEND.

AMAZING prof! I adore his teaching style and he engages everyone in the class. 100% straightforward, makes jokes, and the material is handwritten by him in lecture, then put onto the exams. The textbook is an ESSENTIAL supplement if you want to understand everything and clarify specifics, but otherwise, would love to have him again! Just STUDY.
Really Tough

We ALL love him!! His class is very interesting, but make sure you attend to every class because his exams are based on his notes. He hand write the notes in class. The exam was long so make sure you well prepared and memorize every detail.

Dr. Punja is an amazing professor. If you ever get the chance to take 101 with him I absolutely recommend that you do. His exams are tough and the definition questions can kill you but if you really study all of his notes you'll be fine. Most, if not all the questions are straight out of his notes and they're pretty much the same as previous years.

At first glance, an amazing prof. He is clear with explanations but when it comes to exams, watch out. He looks for KEY WORDS. If you do not have the key words he is looking for, you can get a 0 on that question, no matter how much you know and wrote about it. He doesnt mark you on what you have, he deducts you from what you dont have. BRUTAL
Punja is a BEAUTYY such a great prof with an amazing passion for biology, can't say anything negative about him!
One of the funniest profs I've ever had! He gives review questions every week, which are very helpful because he gives similar questions on his exams.
one of the best professors if not the best professor I have ever had. He is funny, and explains things so well, as well as reviews the things from the previous lecture to hammer in important points.
Really bad prof, lies about the exams. Didn't enjoy the class since what was on the exam was not what he told us. I'm just glad I studied everything. I do not recommend him.

Great Prof! Really funny, makes coming to class worthwhile. Midterms and Finals are strictly from the notes. Dont even need the textbook, his exams are from the notes he writes in class. Would LOVE to have him as a prof again!

AMAZING PROF.incredibly funny.the best part of bio 101. the only hard parts were photosynthesis (the last unit) and the lab exams, those were tricky! Kennedy loves his graphs, memorize ALL of them for the final.(for real, you'll ace his tests) over all, if you see punja's name on the course, TAKE IT

Amazing Prof. I would recommend him to anyone! He is extremely passionate. However, we did lack time near the end learning photosynthesis with tones of cycles which is manageable. There are no surprises with his exams however, Kennedy had lots of surprises... He puts tiniest and most useless questions.
Very good prof with brilliant notes, but he waited until the very end of term to teach us all the confusing cycles that we needed to know on the exam.  that was super stressful!
LOVED THIS PROF. super CLEAR and ORGANIZED notes. interesting and funny prof made lectures enjoyable and easy to pay attention. exams were quite easy!
Most amazing and caring prof ever! Truly wants everyone to succeed and gives you the tools to. Also has an amazing sense of humour. Gives you review questions. Overall I loved his part of the course!
Most amazing Biology prof. at SFU. If you attend classes and study his notes you'll do well. Fair exams.

He makes the lectures really interesting and clear. You don't know how good a professor he is until the course switches to another terrible prof. The only thing is that there were some really weird questions in the midterm about little details that you have no way of memorizing. Great prof!

very helpful and funny proff...always starts the first class with poem and ends the last with poem and jokes alot in class...very helpful lecutre slides and the questions which he sends in email are extremely helpful so do it and read the text you will be fine...

His notes are all you need to know for tests. If you can memorize what he says you should do well. Make sure you provide a lot of details though as the marking can be extremely picky. Even if you don't think it's important write it down anyways.

Dudes a boss! His classes were actually interesting and worth going to because his notes are GODLY. You don't need to read the textbook because of his notes. Also cracks jokes to keep you entertained. His tests are generally fair (just read his ntoes to do well) but the marking is picky. Thats about the only downside to this guy. Highly Recommended

He flies too fast and expects us to do the same in midterm - 100 points in 50 minutes, 9 pages of mostly short answers. Illogical MT terms such as "definition" when he wants function and structures.  Yes, enthusiastic, helpful, encouraging, but unclear and unfair exam.  Typical biology pickiness with details whether requested by question or not.

Lecture is fun despite it being an introductory course, he is surprisingly enthusiastic -- a nice change from other classes. Office hours are extremely fun if your knowledge and application is superb because he's very knowledgeable and an interesting person to hold a conversation with.

I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS GUY! His notes are amazing. However do NOT follow the tip provided below. Reading the textbook is crucial to do well in the course. Memorization is not the key, its understanding the material. Read the text, do the notes, complete ALL the labs and do your tutorial question and you'll pass with flying colours.
Really good Bio prof! funny, smart, and knows how to teach the class. Take his notes down and you'll b fine! though lotsa stuff to know, he makes the class much more interesting to attend!
Very fun and knows how to keep you interested...the nature of the subject is what makes the course hard, he just makes it more enjoyable

Very nice and funny prof! Definitely recommend him. Lectures were not boring, good handwritten notes (however its not enough to help you ace the course, use textbook?) Exams are fair. He only taught plants for us though.
Lied about the final, otherwise a decent competent professor.

Excellent prof! He demonstrated intense knowledge of what he was teaching, and tried to engage the class in every lecture. He was very charismatic, and I'm sad I won't be having him again in the future. If you need 101, sign up for his class!!
BEST professor in the entire face of the planet. I basically lived and breather for his lectures. Crystal clear lectures. Fair exams. Top notch prof.

Amazing prof. Some of his lectures made my day, very humorous. Can speak and write very clear simultaneously, but his notes don't go very in depth. Exams somewhat difficult and requires mostly detailed regurgitation of the material in textbook. I might even call him an inspiring prof, will try to get u interested in plants =)
Best Bio prof ever. =)
Awesome professor. Classes are fun and entertaining =)
They should really call him Dr. Fabulous. He is awesome! Incredibly straight forward and a downright awesome teacher!
A great prof. He is organized and very clear. His notes are all you need. His exams are easy and straight from the notes. I totaly recommend that you take any of his classes.
Great prof!  His notes are clear and easy to understand.  The textbook isn't really necessary and is used only for reference.  Learn and memorize his notes and you'll do fine.
Great Teacher!
His notes are clear and precise and his lectures are interesting

Very good prof!!  Loves teaching and makes the note-taking very accessible to first year students.  Spoon feeds the notes on the overhead and tells students exactly what to study for the final.  Easy course and enthusiastic prof!
Great professor who made biology fun, even in the morning. Enthusiastic and likes carrots. Easy tests that even have some questions right from the practice test.
He is AWSOME!! very clear on what he's talking about, he also funny.  He really makes you want to go to lecture ^^.  Just study his notes and try practice before the test then you will do good.

Awesome Prof! Learn a lot in class that helps to avoid text. Course is general/review bio 12. Memorize notes word for word to easily ace exam. Plus Punja's a funny guy that makes you want to attend his early class and even get there early! Even though he uses same jokes year to year, you still laugh each time...you know about the 3 grandmas
An excellent teacher. His notes are clear, and his pace is reasonable. Also has a cute coffee mug.
Spoonfeeds his students. Sets exams based on past midterms - inflated averages.
No Comments
He's passionate about what he teaches and he's very willing to help you.  Do the practice midterm and practice final because he take most of the stuff out from the practice exam.  Great prof.
No Comments

he gave very good notes, in where they outlined all you needed to know. he was very friendly and answered any questions asked in class. he was also alvailable for extra help. he made the class very interesting. if you have a chance to take any class with punja take it--its a good experience!!!!

very passionate about wat he's teaching. u learn about plants but he makes it quite interesting. his midterms was practically a photocopy of the practice midterm. he's very friendly n tries to b funny :P
Awesome! Knowledgeable & approachable.
GREAT PROF! YOU CAN RELAY ON HIS NOTES..

HE DOESNT TAKE THE TIME TO LOOK OVER UR EXAMS!! and the TAs in this course are not fair about marking the exams...and dr.punja doesnt care so much about that. HE IS VERY LAZY!! and tries to escape from you when you request to go over your exam marks....!!
Very clear notes, though there are many to take.  Exam questions were fair, but the answer key was kind of bizarre.
what can i say about his exam...he failed almost the entire class
Dr. Punja is a great prof. He makes the lectures fun and easy to understand.
good lecturer, fair exams but a bit too detailed
very clear in lectures! His notes are great and he is very good at explaining concepts, make sure to listen to what he is saying, very valuable.  Makes bio interesting
makes intro bio interesting, he loves those enzymes though.
good lecturer but hard exams
hard class, but he makes the lectures fun
Always made his class fun. Gets very excited about everything!
his notes are very clear and helpful.
Awesome prof.  Tests were very detailed though.
No Comments
not easy, but good notes
No Comments
No Comments
He's a great prof, who manages to make intro bio fun...
No Comments
Excellent prof. Lively lectures
I HATE HER PREPERATION!!! she usually goes into lecture late and tries to speed it up @ the end...very unprofessional...and lecture usually makes me fall asleep.  she's quite cool in lab though..
